# indexOfSelectedItem

**Instance Property**

The index of the last item selected from the pop-up list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var indexOfSelectedItem: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is `-1` if no item is selected; otherwise, it is the index of the selected item. Nothing is selected in a newly initialized combo box.

## Manipulating the Selection

- **deselectItem(at:)**: Deselects the pop-up list item at the specified index if it’s selected.
- **objectValueOfSelectedItem**: The object corresponding to the last item selected from the pop-up list.
- **selectItem(at:)**: Selects the pop-up list row at the given index.
- **selectItem(withObjectValue:)**: Selects the first pop-up list item that corresponds to the given object.
